name: Rumeza Fatima
about: I'm a computer science and data science student who loves building things for humans. I'm advanced in Python and JS/TS with a lot of experience in full-stack mobile and web development as well as a mastery of turning designs into code. My most epic skillset lies in the fact that I consistently push the boundaries of coventional thinking to turn my ambitious visions into reality. I love chasing after unique experiences and jumping off (imaginary) cliffs to test my skills.

work_experiences.title: Production Engineer
details: Developing skills in DevOps, infrastructure, and distributed systems as a Production Engineering Fellow, focusing on the principles of reliability and scalability that power Meta's services.

work_experiences.title: Health Interfaces Developer Intern
details: Implemented FHIR data lake via AWS HealthLake, ingesting over 250,000 clinical records from Epic into a normalized format. Built a Django-based API layer to enable secure and efficient access to FHIR resources, reducing data retrieval time by 40%
Designed and developed product waitlist site using Next.js; used AWS quicksite to optimize site analytics management by 80%
Engineered full stack web interface for v1 Revaz AI in Svelte and Django to manage data interoperability with health systems

work_experiences.title: Founding Engineer
details: Designed MVP platform for early pharma-tech startup in Pakistan, creating Figma mockups for various user group portals
Developed 3+ pitch decks for early seed rounds, securing a partnership with Pakistan's largest pharmacy chain, Bashir Sons
Prototyped UX/UI for customer and delivery system interfaces and developed MVP with React Native and NativewindCSS

work_experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
details: Performed UI audits on internal touchscreen project, expertly restyling and creating 7+ pages to replicate proposed Figma UI
Learned TypeScript and stylized components in strict time, finalizing features for internal project 3 months ahead of schedule

Pitched feature for company to add to recruitment project, transitioning to fullstack role, enabling prospective employees to get matched with roles based on skills, creating a valuable data collection asset and attractive recruitment strategy for company

work_experiences.title: Co-founder
details: Founded digital career advisor that creates personalized opportunity pathways and tailored resources for young professionals
Developed 3+ pitch decks for early seed rounds, resulting in acceptance to LOI, partnerships with ADPLIST and Bachmanity VC
Prototyped platform in Figma, creating landing site in a week using ReactJS and Tailwind, garnering 30+ signups in initial days

work_experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
details: Utilized ReactJS and TailwindCSS to develop and style internal ecommerce project, shipping V2 months ahead of schedule
Created 20+ features, programming controllers and models with Ruby on Rails to optimize data distribution in app
Developed company's hackathon portal, creating template for future hackathons, leading to 70% increase in participants

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science and Data Science
details: Relevant Coursework: Object Oriented Programming, Data Structures, System Design, Deep Learning

hobbies.name: Filmmaking
hobbies.desc: As much as I love building things, I also love telling stories. Filmmaking allows me to combine my love for technology and art to create something that can resonate with a variety of audiences and maximize the reach of my innovations

hobbies.name: Travelling
hobbies.desc: I love travelling and exploring new places. It's a great way to learn about different cultures and cuisines and to meet new people.
